case.title: Black woman for ltr
case.text:
Sweet, lady here for a real man no bs, ready to be in a relationship. Im a chubby girl,small bbw or whatever prefer latin but not a must. Dont kow how much more to the point i can get,lol Oh and if you have a crazy/jealous ex and or baby momma IM GOOD! dont reply to this,thanx:)
